hadiths.text: Urwa has narrated it on the authority of 'A'isha that when Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) took a bath because of sexual intercourse, he first washed his hands before dipping one of them into the basin, and then performed ablu- tion as is done for prayer

chapter.eng-name: Description of ghusl in the case of janabah (sexual impurity)
